system.description:
You have surat inscribed upon your weapons burning red, which burn hotter and hotter and eventually explode as the fight continues.

Effect: Whenever you make an area or ranged attack, gain 1 Explosion Charge. When you reach 3 Explosion Charges, immediately trigger the following effect.

Gatling Fulmination: Deal 1 True Hit to all enemies adjacent to you, then lose all Explosion Charges.
